item.title: NKE
item.description: score:51 Chances: NIKE (NKE) strategic efforts, including progress on the Consumer Direct Acceleration strategy, appear encouraging. Passive income investors can potentially increase their wealth in the long run by investing in this dividend stock. Nike and PepsiCo are two of the most recognized brands in the world.
